General.Name: Luzhou Lao Jiao Co Ltd
General.Description: Luzhou Laojiao Co.,Ltd provides liquor products in China. It offers its products under the National Cellar 1573, Luzhou Laojiao Tequ, Luzhou Laojiao Jiaoling Baijiu, Luzhou Laojiao Touqu, Luzhou Laojiao Erqu, Luzhou Laojiao Health Care Baijiu, and Luzhou Laojiao Multi-mixed Cocktail brands. The company was formerly known as Luzhou Laojiao Distillery and changed its name to Luzhou Laojiao Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Luzhou, China.
General.Address: Luzhou Laojiao headquarters building, Luzhou, China, 646000

6.Name: Mr. Hong Bo  Wang
